definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
lit. when one grass burns the other grass sighs (idiom); fig. to have sympathy with a like-minded person in distress
lit. when one grass burns the other grass sighs (idiom); fig. to have sympathy with a like-minded person in distress
to stick up for a wrongdoer
wishing for profit, but causing loss (idiom); good intentions that lead to disaster/It all ends in tears.
to cover up mistakes or crimes/to stitch up/to fix
to hold back from saying precisely what is on one's mind
to feel gratitude mixed with shame
to cling to the rich and powerful (idiom); to advance one's career by currying favor/social climbing
